text: Ate uha alaha tom' binham ajihi'am cizam di badagi karade hana jihari'am na unham da nukasana karadi'am hana ate na hi labha pahuca'undi'am hana ate uha kahide hana ki iha alaha de kola sade sifarasi hana. Akho, ki tusim alaha nu ajihi gala di sucana dide ho, jihari usa nu dharati ate asamanam de vica pata nahim. Uha usa tom pavitara ate sresata hai, jisa nu uha sarika bana'unde hana
